title: The JBL Tune 510BT is on Sale Right Now for Less than 30 Bucks!
description: Grab them for 25% less! The post The JBL Tune 510BT is on Sale Right Now for Less than 30 Bucks! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: Good-sounding audio doesn’t need to be overly expensive, and this is certainly the case with a good number of newer wireless headphones on the market. One example is the JBL Tune 510BT, which is currently on sale via Amazon at the moment—the 510BT packs quite a number of features that’ll make you double-check its low asking price. In terms of features, you’re getting a powerful bass sound, easy switching between two different paired devices, up to 40 hours of battery life on a single charge, physical earcup controls, and support for smart assistant access including Google Assistant and Siri. You can check out the deal using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Good-sounding audio doesn’t need to be overly expensive, and this is certainly the case with a good number of newer wireless headphones on the market. One example is the JBL Tune 510BT, which is currently on sale via Amazon at the moment—the 510BT packs quite a number of features that’ll make you double-check its low asking price.

In terms of features, you’re getting a powerful bass sound, easy switching between two different paired devices, up to 40 hours of battery life on a single charge, physical earcup controls, and support for smart assistant access including Google Assistant and Siri.
